item.title: Humanize Seconds
item.description: This is a little helper that can I use for string representation of a seconds. It will say how many days, hours, minutes or seconds there is in a input value.

item.title: Rails Engine Intro
item.description: You probably already used a lot of gems that are actually a rails engine, e.g. `ActiveAdmin`, `Devise`, `Forem`, `Spree`, ...

item.title: Json Api Namespaced Models
item.description: If you want to have a resource that needs access to a namespaced model, you can overwrite the `resource_type_for(model)` method from `JSONAPI::Resource` module.

item.title: JSON API Multi Lang Support
item.description: I started using `jsonapi-resources` gem in order to create a JSON API according to JSON schema defined by http://jsonapi.org/
